lead_paragraph: From the White House to San Francisco police union headquarters, Colin Kaepernick's name came up Monday as his decision to sit down during the national anthem reached far beyond football.

headline.print_headline: Kaepernick's Decision to Sit Through Anthem Scrutinized
headline.main: Kaepernick's Decision to Sit Through Anthem Scrutinized
